CURRICULUM VITAE 
PERSONAL DETAILS 
Full Name: 
TRAN THI HUYEN CHI 
Job Titles: 
Team Lead + Test Lead + BA + Application Consultant 
Date of Birth: 
08 / 09 / 1983 
Gender:  Female 
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY  
❖ Deadline-oriented Software Tester with 10 years’ in manual environment, some basic experiences about 
automation testing as Selenium IDE plugin and TA tool. 
❖ Easily collaborate with developers and project managers to accomplish milestones. 
❖ An effective leader, skilled in enlisting the support of all team members in aligning with project and 
organizational goals. 
❖ Experienced supervisor with a management style that motivates staff productivity.

EXPERIENCE REFERENCE AND SKILL SET 
❖ 
Company Name: FPT SOFTWARE HCM 
❖ 
From: 12/2017 
❖ 
To: 01/2019 
❖ 
Position: 
Team Lead + Test Lead + BA + Application Consultant 
❖ 
Job 
Description: 
Project Descriptions: 
1. M35 web application - ERP system (from 12/2017 to 
02/2018) 
Position : Test Manager  
- Create testplan, review testcase, test data 
- Manage team 25 members 
- Provide training courses about testing process for freshers 
and junior testers 
2. BOEING web application (from 03/2018 to 06/2018) 
Position : Test Lead  
- Manage team 5 members 
- Analysis requirements and work together with US team 
- Create and review manual and automated testcases  
3. UQM Sysmex - Healthcare (from 07/2018 - 08/2018) 
Position: Team Lead + BA in VN team 
- Transfer all documents to developers, testers 
- Write the SOW documents and create product backlogs, 
user stories 
- Kick off meeting and estimation timeline for tasks  
- Work together with US team to get infos and support VN 
team 
4. KPMG - CRM MS Dynamics 365 (from 09/2018 - 
01/2019)  
Position: Test Lead + BA + Application Consultant 
- Create/Review testplan, testcases, test strategy  
- Create/Update FDD, FRD, BRL and implement new 
software programs and applications to meet specific 
business goals and customer needs 
- Manage and troubleshoot existing software applications 
and programs, finding and implementing solutions to existing 
and potential problems 
- Provide live technical support to customers using 
application programs via web or phone communication 
- Create training materials and gives verbal training 
instructions to customers and other staff members, advising 
them on the best ways to use applications and software to 
meet their desired goals and complete tasks. 
Position: Team Lead with team size 10 members   
- Provide leadership to the project teams on both the 
customer and vendor side.  
- Prepare and management of iteration plans, budget, 
dependencies, risks and issues.  
- Manage and lead key teams and personnel in order to 
successfully deliver projects on time and according to the 
Tran Thi Huyen Chi - Resume 
CV_ Tran Thi Huyen Chi 
Page 3 of 7 
quality requirements.  
- Monitor and control each phase and sprints of the project 
implementation according to the approved project schedule. 
- Identify and report project issues and project risks to the 
relevant managers and committees.  
❖ 
Company Name: STUDIO60 GROUP 
❖ 
From: 06/2012 
❖ 
Position: 
QC/QA Lead + Team Lead and acting as Agile Scrum 
Master/PM/BA 
❖ 
To: 11/2017 
❖ 
Job 
Description: 
o QC/QA Lead 
● Managing team size included 30 members both Manual + 
Automation Test 
o Manual Test Analyst: 
● Creating testcase and estimate test effort 
● Testing execution (Functional and System Integration 
Testing) on Sitecore / Umbraco / Salesforces and checking 
with SEO, social links as Google Analytics / Rakuten / Criteo 
/ Listrak.  
● Collaborating with producer in White Sydney team and 
development teams in White Sydney team and S60 VN 
● 3 years experiences for testing on Ecommerce sites with 
platforms as Demandware / EPI  
creating test data in CMS and checking payment methods in 
Adyen, Cybersource, Paypal and Afterpay. 
● API testing using Postman plugin on Chrome and using 
some SQL queries  
● Raising bugs/defects on Jira 
● Browser UI Compatibility, Localization testing  
o Automation Test: 
● Writing some basic scripts in Selenium for regression 
testing 
o Team Lead and acting as Agile Scrum Master/PM/BA: 
• Managing 3 projects with team size included 7-10 
members in each project 
• Managing a scrum team of business analysts, tech leads, 
software developers and testers to elicit and analyse 
requirements, design, build and deploy software solutions to 
agreed schedule, quality and budgets.  
- Coordinating daily stand-ups and retrospectives, tracking 
and reporting progress, help scrum teams to refine and 
streamline the delivery process, identifying and resolving 
issues and risks that impact sprint execution. 
• Defining gaps and promoting/enforcing standards, 
methods, processes and tools to enable best practice 
software development and support. 
• Balancing the customer needs, business needs and 
technical needs to enable successful delivery of strategic 
outcomes. 
• Scoping, estimating and planning new iterations using 
formalized processes and methods.  
• Helping the team to estimate stories based on prior 
knowledge and experience and improving the accuracy of 
those estimates over time.  
• Providing thought leadership and insight to new and 
Tran Thi Huyen Chi - Resume 
CV_ Tran Thi Huyen Chi 
Page 4 of 7 
emerging trends and best practices.  
• Building and maintaining strong and positive working 
relationships with internal and external stakeholders.  
• Taking ownership for the development of project brief, 
project initiation documents or equivalent and contributing to 
business cases among other documents.  
• Determining and managing risks to the projects.  
• Coordinating and fostering teamwork.  
• Developing self-motivated and self-driven teams.  
• Establishing formal reporting arrangements for project 
progress.  
• Providing leadership that fosters a continuous 
improvement and innovation culture.  
• Effectively coach, develop and mentor employees to adapt 
agile practices.  
• Ensuring continuous productivity improvement measures 
are adopted by the team which is measurable with respect to 
velocity per sprint. 
❖ 
Company Name: OFFICIENCE VIETNAM 
❖ 
From: 06/2011 
❖ 
To: 05/2012 
❖ 
Position: 
Senior Software Tester  
❖ 
Job 
Description: 
o Manual Test Analyst: 
● Design testcase and test data 
● Testing Custom WebParts 
● Test execution (Functional and System Integration 
Testing). 
● Attending daily meetings and standup to discuss the work 
status with business, testers 
● Raising bugs/defects on Jira 
● Using browser matrix on desktop and mobile 
o Project descriptions: 
FVHOPISTAL.com is a website application in SharePoint 
Online and SharePoint Server 
❖ 
Company Name: EXENTSOURCE VIETNAM 
❖ 
From: 06/2009 
❖ 
To: 04/2011 
❖ 
 Position: 
Test Lead 
❖ 
Job 
Description: 
o Manual Test Analyst: 
- Contact point with client 
- Assign task to other members 
- Performing Functional / Logical / UI Testing 
- Defect reporting on Jira 
- Planning working schedule for team base on Sprint 
schedule 
o Team Lead: 
• Liaised with business, functional owner and other 3rd party 
vendors during risk engineering and high-level review 
sessions to derive and execute action plans, meeting 
deadlines, standards and stakeholders’ expectations. 
• Elicited requirements with client and prepared detail 
functional specification documents and provided necessary 
Tran Thi Huyen Chi - Resume 
CV_ Tran Thi Huyen Chi 
Page 5 of 7 
UML models (Use Cases, Class Diagrams, Sequence 
Diagrams etc.) using MS Visio. 
• Performed details data analysis, data modelling and 
defined the solutions and strategies for migration of data 
from legacy systems to new web based system. Designed 
detail financial reconciliation process for insurance 
accounting. 
• Audited business & functional necessity documents and 
identified test strategies. Carried out End to End, Functional, 
Integration, Regression and Performance Testing. Actively 
involved in entry and exit criteria decision making process. 
Provided user training and guided UAT process. 
• Prepared the detail execution plan for the team of up to 8 
personnel, monitored outputs to ensure that delivery was 
attained on time, within budgeted costs complied with 
corporate SDLC Policies and guidelines. 
o Project descriptions: 
CDN Cocacola is Ads Network Web application 
- Allow Advertiser is able to control their campaigns 
completely and scientifically 
- Allow Publisher is able to submit website to get revenue 
from Advertiser 
Wine.com is an ecommerce website to promote the wine 
lifestyle, through innovation and buy wine 
❖ 
Company Name: LOGIGEAR VIETNAM 
❖ 
From: 05/2007 
❖ 
To: 06/2009 
❖ 
Position: 
Software Tester  
❖ 
Job 
Description: 
o Manual Test Analyst: 
● Install Leapfrog mini game package 
● Participating in code reviews and requirement analysis. 
● Writing test plans and giving test plan walkthroughs to 
business and development team. 
● Involve in peer review of test planning of other team 
members. 
● Test execution (Functional and System Integration 
Testing). 
● Attending daily meetings and standup to discuss the work 
status with business, testers 
● Raising bugs/defects on TestTrack Pro 
o Automation Tester: 
● 1 years - Writing VB scripts on TA tool based on testcases 
then run scripts to debug 
o Core Tester: 
● Defect management, daily defect status calls with client & 
development team. 
● Ensuring timely preparation and execution of project 
deliverable like Test cases & test scripts Use case & Test 
scenarios. 
● Defect reporting. 
● Attending walk through & creating detailed test status 
reports. 
Tran Thi Huyen Chi - Resume

o Project descriptions: 
Leapfrog mini games and ecommerce site integrates with 
devices to service education
